desc: Internationally acclaimed luxury jewellery designed and made by hand in Guernsey, including necklaces, rings, bracelets and charms. Shop luxury jewellery online today.

layout.text: In our exquisite Sweetie Necklace, our designers have creatively laid out an array of stunning gemstones so that the colours flow wonderfully from one to the next. Featuring an array of gemstones including, Blue Topaz, Iolite, Amethyst and Tourmaline. Sweetie is a wonderful celebration of life in all its colour and vibrancy.
